PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2000-15602000-10-040,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of PAUL D. MANSON, of Gloucester, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term ending February 2, 2001, in the place of the Honourable Barnett J. Danson, who has resigned.
Attachments
